getLoansByOwner(address,uint256,uint256).details: Get loans belonging to owner. If a loan is transferred to another address, that index in the array points to 0

params.end: - end index of owner's loan array
params.owner: - owner of loans to query loans for
params.start: - start index of owner's loan array

getLoansByOwnerAndPool(address,address,u.details: Get loans from specific GammaPool belonging to owner. If a loan is transferred to another address, that index in the array points to 0

params.end: - end index of owner's loan array from `pool`
params.owner: - owner of loans to query loans for
params.pool: - GammaPool to look for loans belonging to owner
params.start: - start index of owner's loan array from `pool`

returns._loans: - loans belonging to user for specific gammaPool

getPools(uint256,uint256).details: Get list of pools from start index to end index (inclusive)

params.end: - end index of owner's loan array
params.start: - start index of owner's loan array

params.poolAddresses: - array of pool address to query

getPoolsWithOwnerLPBalance(address[],add.details: Get pools with LP balance from user listed in the poolAddresses array

params.owner: - user's address who owns the pool

getLoansByOwner(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Loans exist in owner's loan array in the order they're created.

getLoansByOwnerAndPool(address,address,u.notice: Loans exist in owner's loan array for a pool in the order they're created. Index = 0 is the first loan created

getPools(uint256,uint256).notice: The order of the pools in the array is the order in which they were created. (e.g. index 0 is first pool created)
